rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with ample natural light and a welcoming design. The area is designed to adhere to Vastu principles by positioning the main entrance on the north side.

rooms.name: Open-plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: Spacious open-plan kitchen and living room combined area. Designed with modern materials and contemporary aesthetics, ensuring seamless flow between cooking and socializing spaces. Vastu compliant by maintaining proper alignment of the entrance and seating areas.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom on the ground floor designed for short stays. Sized appropriately with adjoining bathroom facilities.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Includes storage and utility spaces for household appliances, cleaning supplies, etc.

openings.description: Main entrance door ensuring north-facing entry as per Vastu principles.
Large windows to enhance natural light in the kitchen and living area.
Windows in open-plan spaces for balanced lighting and airflow.

level_details.notes: The design includes a G+2 structure with emphasis on an open-plan kitchen-living area on the ground floor. Additional features and levels are planned for upper floors.
